name: Ruff Night At The Museum
description:
It’s night and you’re alone in an art museum.  But all of the paintings are of...dogs?

Use WASD to move and the mouse to look around.  Collect keys, admire the artwork, and most importantly: DON'T GET LICKED!

A Game By:

  • Trevor Whitaker Black
  • Casey Donnellan
  • Terry Nguyen
  • Weston Wright
